reviewText:
This is a great video all about hair cuts, hair coloring, and hair styles- I wanted to get an edge on my beauty class, so I purchased this well priced dvd. It had so much great information that allowed me to learn about the best ways to cut hair, to add color and highlights/lowlights to hair, and all the ways to style hair.

I highly recommend this video to anyone wanting to learn all about hair!
Old styles, stilted presentation, models have that pouty look that tells me they are not thrilled about what they are doing.
